content_items.title: Hey!
description: My name is Jokubas Serapinas. I am a Medialogy Bachelor student at Aalborg University Copenhagen and a Student Android Developer at Shape Games ApS. Thank you for coming to my page!
Here you will get to know me better. I will not only present my previous experience but also touch upon what am I like outside the IT world.

content_items.title: Student Android Developer
description: On May 2020, I started my career as an Android developer at Shape Games ApS.
Here I worked on the platform for popular sports betting apps used in Denmark (Oddset), USA (betJack), South America (BetWarrior) and many more client countries.

content_items.title: Medialogy Bachelor
description: On September 2018, I started Medialogy Bachelor studies as an international student at the Aalborg University Copenhagen.
Here I got both theoretical and practical foundation for problem solving due to the university's Problem-based Learning (PBL) methodology.

content_items.title: Music
description: Since my childhood, music was one of my main activities and passions.

Being 10 years old I started playing trombone at Plunge's Mykolas Oginskis art school. Throughout that time I participated in various concerts and competitions, where I was able to win several prizes.
Later I started singing both in a vocal group Hello and individually. This led me to participate in The Voice of Lithuania, where I made it to the blind auditions.
